title: Budtender
coverLetter:
Ian McIntosh

Mud Puppy Landscaping

43650 SE George Rd

Estacada, OR 97023

icm4330@gmail.com

(503) 608-0034


To my fellow cannabis advocates,


I find myself constantly intrigued and amazed by this wonderful plant. My affection for cannabis has driven an insatiable curiosity that I have used to educated myself in the life and science of this wonderful medicinal plant.


Currently -and for the last two years- I own and operate Mud Puppy Landscaping out of Clackamas County. I have an OLCC Marijuana worker's permit and it's number is 8S37P5. I currently consult, manage and mitigate medical and personal gardens. I am intimately familiar with germination, propagation, the vegetative cycle, approved sprays, the fruiting cycle, grow room cleanliness, beneficial insect introduction and maintenance, harvesting, wet or dry trimming, drying, curing, grading, testing and packaging.


I have also amassed 2000+ hours in the extraction and concentration disciplines. Ethanol extraction is my favorite but I'm familiar with: closed-loop Hydrocarbon Extraction (especially with Bhogart’s 3 and 8 tube systems), CO2 extraction, rosin pressing, tincture making, winterizing, fractional distillation and short path distillation.


The five years previous I spent working as an Inventory manager and Lavender Oil Distiller for a international essential oil wholesaler- Liberty Natural Products @the Oregon Lavender Farm. I have five year’s experience from LNP with running a 50 acre harvest, steam distillation, forklift driving and inventory control. It took three people to replace me when I left.


Thank you for your time and consideration,


Ian McIntosh
